channel.title: I cant post my server!
channel.description: For some reason I am unable to post my server online, when I post it on the server status page it says that my server is offline, but I checked an it is online. Can someone else try to post it for me. The server ip is ultravscape.no-ip.biz , you guys can check if it is online or not and help me a bit out at this, im kinda new :confused: :confused:

item.title: I cant post my server!
item.dc:creator: @ultrav33 ultrav33
item.description:
@ultrav33 wrote:

I dont need a server hoster, can someone atleast help me out in how to do it? And I did port forward, I am able to connect, can sumone check if they can connect and tell me if it works, the ip is ultravscape.no-ip.biz[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 17, 2008, 04:54:19 pm[/size][hr]anyone??

Read full topic

item.title: I cant post my server!
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Make sure you portforwarded and all that jazz.

Read full topic

item.title: I cant post my server!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

7) Asking for a hoster is strictly forbidden.
Even though your not asking for a server hoster this is still hosting a server. Even if someone else does it it would make no difference.

Read full topic
